name: Basement Lab
longDesc:
You are in the basement lab.
To the west, a hatch leads up and out to the yard.
It is the only real exit.
On the northern wall, in the corner to the east, there is a laundry chute which opens up to a laundry basket.
You cannot climb up it, but you can slide down it if you know where the entrance is.
There is a desk on the south wall, with a computer and a big, old fashioned, keyboard.
You need a password to access the computer.
The computer has the software for the shrink gun.
description:
You are in the basement lab.
To the west, a hatch leads up and out to the yard.
It is the only real exit.
On the northern wall, in the corner to the east, there is a laundry chute which opens up to a laundry basket.
You cannot climb up it, but you can slide down it if you know where the entrance is.

laundry chute.name: laundry chute
laundry chute.description:
The laundry chute leads up to the small bedroom, but you can't climb up it.
You can only slide down it.

desk.name: desk
desk.description: The computer is on the desk, but you can't see it from here, you have to CLIMB DESK to look at it.

computer.name: computer
computer.description: You must ENTER PASSWORD to access this computer

software.name: software
software.description: All the code you need to program the shrink ray to make things big again.

exitBlock: there is an eagle outside circling for a bite size snack, and you are currently bite size
